description: I’m a software developer who thrives on bringing ideas to life through technology. I step in first, take ownership, and give my full dedication to any task. I love communicating, understanding different perspectives, and sharing my insights on stage. Constant learning and embracing challenges define me, and I blend technical expertise, leadership, and creative energy to make a meaningful impact in every environment. My portfolio’s black and yellow theme reflects my dual nature—black embodies my sharp focus, determination, and innovation, while yellow represents my energy, creativity, and passion for connection.

education.degree: Secondary Education from J.S.P.M Cygnet Public School
Higher Secondary Education from J.K College of Sciences
Graduation from AISSMS Institute of Information Technology (Savitribai Phule Pune University)
